attributes.action: Allow ALL Students across the country free NHS treatment (dental, opticians, prescriptions)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students live on very little money, this money pays rent, food and book fees. Why should we have to pay NHS fees when we really can't afford to. Why should our health suffer because we seek higher education? What is the difference between us and school children and college students apart from we have no parental contribution and have much more money going out than going in?!
